<js>
var nextChapterUrl = null; 
try {    
    var doc = result;
    if (!doc) {        
        throw new Error("HTML è§£æå¤±è´¥"); 
    }        
    var nextLink = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(doc).select("a:containsOwn(ä¸‹â”€ç« )");
    if (nextLink) {        
        var onclickValue = nextLink.attr("onclick");
        if (onclickValue) {                        
            var idRegex = /location\.href='([^']+)\.idx'/;
            var idMatch = onclickValue.match(idRegex);
            if (idMatch && idMatch[1]) {
                var chapterIdPart = idMatch[1];                 
                var checkRegex = /_\d+$/; 
                if (checkRegex.test(chapterIdPart)) {                                      
                    var newFileName = chapterIdPart + ".html";                                        
                    var lastSlashRegex = /\/[^/]*$/;
                    if (typeof baseUrl === 'string') {                        
                        nextChapterUrl = baseUrl.replace(lastSlashRegex, "/" + newFileName);
                        
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
} catch (e) {    
    nextChapterUrl = null; 
}
result = nextChapterUrl;
</js>

let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("æ»‘åŠ¨éªŒè¯")) {
        let headers = {
             'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl

            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);

            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);

        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "è‡ªåŠ¨éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('.read-content@html', src);

    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//å¤„ç†é‡æ–°è·å–æ–‡æœ¬æ—¶å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°çš„é”™è¯¯ã€‚
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;

while (retryCount < maxRetries) {

    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨é‡è¯•...ï¼ˆå½“å‰ç¬¬${retryCount}æ¬¡é‡è¯•ï¼‰`);

}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "é‡è¯•ä¸‰æ¬¡ä»ç„¶æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œçŠ¶å†µã€‚"
}
result;

                stars += i < starCount? 'â˜…' : 'â˜†';

 ${comment.content}

`;

} catch (error) {

âœ  è¯„åˆ†ï¼š{{@@class.score_box@span@text}}

ğŸ‘ è§‚çœ‹ï¼š{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.2@text}}
â¤ï¸ æ”¶è—ï¼š{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.3@text}}
ğŸ· ç®€ä»‹ï¼š{{@@class.ellipsis@text##å°è¯´ç®€ä»‹ï¼š}}`;
intro=info+`\n­\nã€âœ¨è¯„è®ºâœ¨ã€‘æœ€æ–°\n­${logOutput}`
